source.name: 2010 Initial Toxics Release Inventory data for the state of Michigan
source.description: The Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) is a publicly available EPA database that contains information on toxic chemical releases and waste management activities reported annually by facilities in certain industries as well as federal facilities.  The 2010 Initial TRI dataset includes approximately 96 percent of the data expected to be reported in the 2010 TRI National Analysis.  Most paper submissions, late submissions and electronic submission with problems are not included in this data release.   See http://www.epa.gov/tri/tridata/preliminarydataset/final_2010_initial_dataset_QandAs.pdf for limitations and other information regarding the use of this data.
